snippet.title: Termina Invasion RELEASE AND TRAILER (F3) (Download link in description)
snippet.description:
Download link:
https://romhacking.com/hack/termina-invasion
Mirror 1:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/jffbb72fllwgd55/Termina_Invasion.zip/file
Mirror 2:
https://mega.nz/file/eIMEwCoJ#pS5DmooG0zF4PmIiK6ZIs1F_X-W3fI7RSx4eHXz8zxg

You need to use the included flips tool to apply the patch to an unmodified Super Mario 64 (U) [!] ROM. I can't give you that. Google is your friend.

Keep in mind that this is a short hack. It's also my first one. Don't go in expecting something like Kaze's OoT x SM64. 

This hack is not console compatible. You can technically run it on console if you disable the RCVI hack and dial back the drawing distance in the Snowhead level, but it's so slow it's not worth it. The link model has too many tris, the level maps are not optimized at all, etc. I will make a new version in the future with more levels. That new version will be console compatible.
